backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the CertiPrep AI backend, managing certifications, domains, objectives, questions, flashcards, test results, PDF progress, and user profiles with role-based access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented UI reordering features across Dashboard, CertificationSelector, and StudyMaterials pages, mapping each feature to its affected files, components, and test requirement IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of frontend source file paths to short summaries describing the purpose and key behaviors of each page or hook component in the CertiPrep AI frontend.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the React SPA, mounting the app into a root div and loading the Vite entry module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures TanStack Router with all application routes (Dashboard, CertificationSelector, StudyMode, QAPractice, Flashcards, PracticeTest, StudyMaterials) wrapped in a shared Layout.
frontend/src/components/FlashcardDeck.ts: Reusable flashcard component with flip animation, progress indicator, and correct/incorrect action buttons that appear after the card is revealed.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: App shell component providing a sticky header with logo, desktop and mobile navigation links, and an 'AI Ready' status badge wrapping all page content.
frontend/src/components/PDFViewer.tsx: A modal PDF/HTML viewer component that tracks and persists reading scroll progress per certification using debounced backend saves, and restores scroll position on reopen.
frontend/src/components/VoiceControls.ts: A UI panel for text-to-speech and speech-to-text controls, displaying speaking/listening status, voice settings (rate, pitch, voice selection), and a mic toggle button.
frontend/src/data/certifications.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces and a static dataset of CompTIA certifications with detailed domain breakdowns including objectives, key terms, ports, protocols, and study notes.
frontend/src/data/studyMaterials.ts: Defines interfaces and a static list mapping each CompTIA certification to its associated HTML study guide file paths and metadata.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login, logout, identity state, and login status to child components.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for CRUD operations on flashcards, questions, test results, and reading progress, each interacting with the ICP actor.
Custom hook wrapping the Web Speech API to provide start/stop listening, live transcript, and interim transcript state.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechSynthesis.ts: Custom hook that manages text-to-speech via the SpeechSynthesis API, including voice selection ranked by quality, rate/pitch controls, and markdown stripping.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet importing Inter and Space Grotesk fonts, defining Tailwind base/component/utility layers, CSS custom properties for a dark navy theme, and utility classes for card flip animations, gradients, and glow effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/CertificationSelector: Page component that displays a grid of certification cards with exam details, domain previews, and navigation links to study, flashcard, and test routes.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page showing all certifications as cards with the latest test score progress bar and quick-action links to Study, Flashcards, and Test sections.
frontend/src/pages/Flashcards.tsx: Flashcard study page for a given certification that supports generating/loading cards, tracking correct/incorrect answers through setup/study/review phases, and saving cards to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/PracticeTest.tsx: Timed practice test page that generates multiple-choice questions for a certification, tracks answers with a countdown timer, submits results to the backend, and displays a scored review.
frontend/src/pages/QAPractice.tsx: Interactive Q&A practice page that lets users filter questions by domain, answer one at a time with immediate feedback, and review pass/fail results at the end.
frontend/src/pages/StudyMaterials.tsx: Study materials listing page that displays certification cards with reading progress, and opens an in-app PDF viewer for individual study documents.
frontend/src/pages/StudyMode.tsx: AI-style instructor chat page for a certification domain that generates contextual text responses to student questions and supports voice input/output controls.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with helpers to persist, retrieve, and clear those values via sessionStorage and history.replaceState.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining dark mode, custom color palettes (navy, amber, electric, chart, sidebar) using OKLCH variables, extended typography/container-query plugins, and custom border radius and box shadow tokens.
project_state.json: Project state manifest for CertiPrep AI describing the app's architecture, 8 CompTIA certifications, existing features, known issues, and design guidelines at schema version 1.0.0 / project state version 13.
